tokens.resolved_gloss: to end, whether intransitive (to cease, be finished, perish) or transitive (to complete, prepare, consume)

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to make mouths at, i.e. to scoff; hence (from the effort to pronounce a foreign language) to interpret, or (generally) intercede

tokens.resolved_gloss: to cut (off, down or asunder); by implication, to destroy or consume; specifically, to covenant (i.e. make an alliance or bargain, originally by cutting flesh and passing between the pieces)
